backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining core domain models (orphanages, programs, activities, people, documentation, media, schedules, kid profiles) with persistent Map-based storage, access control, blob storage, and kid context session state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing frontend kid-mode flows and layouts, listing affected files, dependencies, test requirements, and confidence levels for two kid-mode features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of frontend source files covering authentication, admin access, dashboard layout, program/activity management, documentation, and kid-mode related components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base styles for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React application to the root div and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component orchestrating authentication, profile setup, kid-mode selection, and conditional rendering between kid mode layout and internal dashboard.
frontend/src/components/activities/Activ: Modal dialog for creating and editing activities with program and orphanage selection, status management, validation, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminOnly.t: Wrapper component that conditionally renders children only for admin users, otherwise showing an admin-access-required message.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authorization gate that blocks guest or undefined roles from accessing protected content and displays an access-denied card.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginCard.t: Renders a login card that authenticates users via Internet Identity, showing loading state and handling re-login edge cases by clearing query cache.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting new users to enter their name and create a default user profile, with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/common/ArchiveCo: Reusable confirmation dialog for archiving actions, displaying a title, description, and pending state for the confirm button.
frontend/src/components/documentation/Do: Dialog for creating or viewing a documentation entry, allowing activity selection and content entry, with permission checks and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/kidMode/KidModeL: Main layout for Kid Mode, showing a kid-friendly header, navigation between programs and attachments, and controls to exit Kid Mode.
frontend/src/components/kidMode/KidModeS: Handles selection of a kid profile, auto-selecting when only one exists and rendering loading, empty, or multi-profile selection states.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Top-level dashboard layout managing the current section state and rendering the corresponding page with side navigation and header.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Dashboard header displaying the current section title, user avatar and profile info, and providing a sign-out action.
frontend/src/components/layout/SideNav.t: Sidebar navigation listing dashboard sections with icons, highlighting the active section and conditionally showing admin options.
frontend/src/components/orphanages/Orpha: Modal dialog for creating or editing orphanage records with form validation, state management, and create/update mutations, including capacity and occupancy handling.
frontend/src/components/people/PersonDia: Dialog component to add a new person (volunteer/facilitator/etc.) with basic fields, validation, and a create-person mutation; editing is view-only.
frontend/src/components/programs/Program: Comprehensive dialog for creating or editing programs, managing program details, documents, images, schedules, and attachments with admin-only actions and previews.
Simple dialog to preview a program image attachment with options to close or download the file.
Monthly calendar view for a program’s schedule events, allowing admins to add or archive events and navigate between months.
frontend/src/components/programs/Schedul: Dialog for creating a schedule event for a program, collecting date, time, and details and submitting via a create-event mutation.
frontend/src/components/sprint/SprintBoa: Card component representing an activity on a sprint board, showing title, program, status, and optional drag handle and detailed metadata.
React component rendering a sprint board column with draggable activity cards, handling drag-and-drop status changes and authentication checks.
Defines activity status constants, types, color mappings, and column configurations for simple and detailed sprint board views.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useActivities.ts: React Query hooks to list, create, update status, and archive activities via the backend actor, with fallback to sample data when empty.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useAdminUsers.ts: Admin-focused hooks for querying users (stubbed), updating user roles, and fetching individual user profiles through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useDocumentation: Hooks for listing, searching, creating, and archiving documentation entries, scoped by activity and backed by React Query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useOrphanages.ts: Hooks to list, fetch, create, update, and archive orphanages, filtering active records and falling back to sample data when needed.
frontend/src/hooks/data/usePeople.ts: Hooks for listing, searching, creating, and archiving people records, filtering by active and non-archived status.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useProgramAttach: Hooks to list program attachments, documents, and images, upload new media, and placeholders for download/archive functionality pending backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/data/usePrograms.ts: Hooks to list, create, update, and archive programs via the backend actor, with sample data fallback when no active programs exist.
frontend/src/hooks/data/useScheduleEvent: Provides React Query hooks to list, create, and archive schedule events for a program, backed by actor API calls and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/kidMode/useKidContext: Defines hooks to list kid profiles, fetch the active kid context, and select or clear a kid context, with query invalidation on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/kidMode/useKidProgram: Exposes hooks to fetch programs and program media attachments available to the active kid context, relying on backend access checks.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Contains hooks to fetch the current caller’s user profile, role, admin status, and to save profile updates via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, handling authentication, admin token setup, and query invalidation on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context and provider for Internet Identity, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: Utility hook that syncs React state with sessionStorage, providing persistence with safe read/write handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, color themes for light and dark modes, and base element styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function to merge and conditionally apply Tailwind and CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/activities/Activities: UI page for listing, filtering, creating, viewing, and archiving activities, integrating data hooks, authentication checks, and interactive dialogs.
Admin-only page that lists users and allows changing their roles via a dropdown, using admin data hooks. Handles loading, empty states, permission errors, and shows role badges.
frontend/src/pages/documentation/Documen: Page for listing, searching, filtering, creating, viewing, and archiving documentation entries tied to activities. Uses dialogs for entry management and confirmation, with toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/kidMode/AssignedProgr: Kid mode page that displays programs assigned to the user, with loading and empty states. Allows navigating to view program materials via a callback.
frontend/src/pages/kidMode/ProgramAttach: Kid mode page for viewing and downloading a program’s attachments, grouped into documents and images. Supports downloading files with feedback and navigation back to programs.
frontend/src/pages/organizations/Organiz: Page for managing orphanage organizations, including search, create, edit, and archive actions. Displays orphanages in a grid with dialogs and confirmation flows.
frontend/src/pages/people/PeoplePage.tsx: Page for managing people records with search and role filtering, plus create, view/edit, and archive actions. Uses dialogs, confirmation prompts, and permission-aware error handling.
frontend/src/pages/programs/ProgramsPage: React page for listing, searching, creating, editing, and archiving Programs using data hooks, dialogs, and confirmation flows, with loading states and permission-aware error handling.
frontend/src/pages/sprint/SprintBoardPag: Kanban-style Sprint Board page that displays Activities across status columns, supports simple/detailed views, drag-style status updates, and enforces authentication and sample-data restrictions.
frontend/src/sampleData/sampleData.ts: Defines static sample seed data for Programs and Orphanages (and related entities) used to demonstrate the app’s workflow on first run, marked as non-editable sample content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters from query or hash, persisting them in sessionStorage, and safely clearing sensitive parameters without page reloads.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme tokens, color system, typography, animations, plugins, and container settings for the app’s design system.
project_state.json: Versioned project metadata capturing overall vision, schema, and a structured list of implemented features, requirements alignment, and current project state.
